content.question: The position of a particle is given by the parametric equations <math alttext="x of t, equals, the natural log of, open parenthesis, t squared plus 1, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>x</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="2.4ex" width="0.0em"></mspace><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math> and <math alttext="y of t, equals, e to the 3 minus t power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>y</mi><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>t</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></math>. What is the velocity vector at time <math alttext="t equals 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="open angled bracket, 1 comma e squared, close angled bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>⟨</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="2.4ex" width="0.0em"></mspace></mrow><mo>⟩</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="open angled bracket, 1 comma the negative of e squared, close angled bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>⟨</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="2.4ex" width="0.0em"></mspace></mrow><mo>⟩</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="open angled bracket, one half comma e squared, close angled bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>⟨</mo><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>⟩</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="open angled bracket, one half comma the negative of e squared, close angled bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>⟨</mo><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>⟩</mo></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open angled bracket, 1 comma the negative of e squared, close angled bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>⟨</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="2.4ex" width="0.0em"></mspace></mrow><mo>⟩</mo></mrow></math>
